content: this pattern is for a continuous granny square blanket using the 6dkb stitches start in the center and keep going until its as big as you like ive created a delicate beautiful shell border for this blanket as well which gives the finished blanket a really polished pretty look enjoy detailsus terminologyskill level easygauge 16 single_crochet x 20 r on h-8 5 mm in yarn shown however you may use any yarn finished size blanket shown is 40 x 40 but you can easily vary to your liking materialsshown in lion brand mandala color changes controlled @ 2000 yards i used approximately 3 5 cakes yardage estimates for other yarnsfor dk or #3 weight yarn you will need approximately 2200 yards for a 40 baby blanket and 3000 yards for a 60 throw-sized blanket for worsted or #4 weight yarn you will need approximately 2000 yards for a 40 baby blanket and 3400 yards for a 60 throw-sized blanket hook furls odyssey 5 mm this pattern can be made with any yarn and corresponding hook
